name: Aztec Challenge Episode One (Commodore Amiga CD32)
name_original: Aztec Challenge Episode One (Commodore Amiga CD32)
description:
Aztec Challenge E01 CD32 remake

Remake of the first level of C64 hit Aztec Challenge. For now

If you like it maybe we'll make some other levels.

-50fps 3D precalc anim

-Hires sprites

-Dynamic back playfield palette

-Cutscene cinematics

-Exclusive new remix of Aztec Chllenge's music on CD

Code - Cobe, Gfx - d4rk 3lf, Music - bluegestalt

If you leave title screen idle for about minute, cpu will start playing the game.

Dont forget to select the cue file when starting/burning the game, dont use just iso.
